TypeSignature.Value: public interface ContentControlBase : IDisposable, System.ComponentModel.IComponent, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

.class public interface auto ansi abstract ContentControlBase implements class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable, class System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

summary.span: 为 Word 解决方案中的内容控件提供基接口，该解决方案通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建。

span.span: Provides the base interface for content controls in Word solutions created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口定义所有内容控件共享的成员。The interface defines members that are shared by all content controls. 有8种类型的内容控件可用于在 Microsoft Office Word 中设计文档和模板。There are eight types of content controls that you can use to design documents and templates in Microsoft Office Word. 内容控件具有一个用户界面 (UI), 该界面具有像窗体这样的受控输入。Content controls have a user interface (UI) that has controlled input like a form. 你可以使用内容控件来防止用户编辑文档或模板的受保护节, 还可以将内容控件绑定到数据源。You can use content controls to prevent users from editing protected sections of the document or template, and you can also bind content controls to a data source. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls)。For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 在内容控件添加到文档后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the content control is added to the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当内容控件作为重做或撤消操作的结果添加到文档中时, 将引发该事件。The event is raised when the content control is added to the document as a result of a redo or undo operation.

summary.span: 当 的 属性的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property of the changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果更改了属性, 则会引发此事件, 方法是编程修改或用户交互。This event is raised if the property is changed is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关属性用途的详细信息, 请参阅类。For more information about the purpose of the property, see the class.

summary.span: 如果内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件，则此事件在 Microsoft Office Word 更新内容控件中的文本之前发生。

span.span: Occurs just before Microsoft Office Word updates the text in the content control, if the content control is bound to a custom XML part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将内容控件绑定到文档中嵌入的 XML 部分 (也称为*自定义 xml 部件*) 中的元素。You can bind content controls to an element in a piece of XML (also named *custom XML part*) that is embedded in the document. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls)和[自定义 XML 部件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview)。For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls) and [Custom XML Parts Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview). 仅当打开文档时修改了自定义 XML 部件中的数据时, 才会引发事件。The event is raised only if the data in a custom XML part is modified when the document is open. 当打开文档时, 不会引发此事件, 并且在关闭文档时修改了自定义 XML 部件中的数据。This event is not raised when the document is opened and the data in a custom XML part was modified when the document was closed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了和事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 此示例假定文档包含绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素的命名。 `plainTextContentControl1`This example assumes that the document contains a named `plainTextContentControl1` that is bound to an element in a custom XML part. 有关演示如何将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素的代码示例, 请参阅[演练:将内容控件绑定到自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts)XML 部件。For a code example that demonstrates how to bind a content control to an element in a custom XML part, see [Walkthrough: Binding Content Controls to Custom XML Parts](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts). 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 对于C#, 还必须将事件处理程序附加到的和事件`plainTextContentControl1`。For C#, you must also attach the event handlers to the and events of `plainTextContentControl1`. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/CS/ThisDocument.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/VB/ThisDocument.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 的默认 。

span.span: Gets or sets the default for the .
One of the values.
The default is System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode.Never.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未 指定值的情况下将添加到集合中,则使用此属性。This property is used in cases where a without a value specified is added to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Delete(bool deleteContent) cil managed

param.name: deleteContent
param.span: 若要删除控件内容，请使用 ；若要保留文档中的控件内容，则使用 。

span.span: to delete the contents of the control; to leave the contents of the control in the document.

summary.span: 从文档中删除动态创建的内容控件，并将其从文档的 中移除。

span.span: Deletes a dynamically created content control from the document and removes it from the in the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应仅用于删除以编程方式在运行时创建的内容控件。This method should only be used to delete a content control that is created programmatically at run time. 如果在设计时添加到文档中的内容控件调用此方法, 则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if you call this method on a content control that is added to the document at design time.

exception.span: 内容控件已在设计时添加到文档。

span.span: The content control was added to the document at design time.

summary.span: 在内容控件从文档中删除之前发生。

span.span: Occurs just before the content control is deleted from the document.

summary.span: 当用户在内容控件中单击，或者以编程方式将光标移到内容控件中时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks in the content control, or when the cursor is moved into the content control programmatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果内容控件嵌套在另一个内容控件中, 则仅引发嵌套控件的事件, 而不引发父控件的事件。If the content control is nested inside another content control, the event is raised only for the nested control, not the parent control. 例如, 如果用户单击嵌套在中的, 则仅为引发此事件; 不会为引发此事件。For example, if the user clicks in a that is nested in a , this event is raised only for the ; this event is not raised for the .

summary.span: 当用户在内容控件外单击，或者以编程方式将光标移出内容控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks outside the content control, or when the cursor is moved outside the content control programmatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果内容控件嵌套在另一个内容控件中, 则仅引发嵌套控件的事件, 而不引发父控件的事件。If the content control is nested inside another content control, the event is raised only for the nested control, not the parent control. 例如, 如果用户单击嵌套在中的外部, 则仅为引发此事件; 不会为引发此事件。For example, if the user clicks outside a that is nested in a , this event is raised only for the ; this event is not raised for the .

summary.span: 获取标识内容控件的唯一编号。

span.span: Gets a unique number that identifies the content control.

value.span: 标识内容控件的唯一编号。

span.span: A unique number that identifies the content control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值由 Microsoft Office Word 确定。The value of the property is determined by Microsoft Office Word. 可以使用此值在代码中标识内容控件。You can use this value to identify a content control in code. 该值对于每个内容控件都是唯一的, 不能更改。The value is unique for each content control and it cannot be changed.

summary.span: 获取 的基础 对象。

span.span: Gets the underlying object for the .
The underlying object for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Office 项目中的每个宿主控件在主机应用程序的对象模型中都有一个基础对象。Every host control in an Office project has an underlying object in the object model of the host application. 使用 Word 项目中的属性可访问对象的基础对象。Use the property in a Word project to access the underlying object for a object. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[主机项和主机控件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview)和[主机项和主机控件的编程限制](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls)。For more information, see [Host Items and Host Controls Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview) and [Programmatic Limitations of Host Items and Host Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls).

summary.span: 在 Microsoft Office Word 正要更新已绑定到内容控件的自定义 XML 部件中的数据之前（即在内容控件中的文本更改之后）发生。

span.span: Occurs just before Microsoft Office Word updates data in a custom XML part that is bound to the content control (that is, after the text in the content control changes).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将内容控件绑定到文档中嵌入的 XML 部分 (也称为*自定义 xml 部件*) 中的元素。You can bind content controls to an element in a piece of XML (also named *custom XML part*) that is embedded in the document. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls)和[自定义 XML 部件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview)。For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls) and [Custom XML Parts Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview). 内容控件中的文本发生更改, 并且内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when the text in a content control changes, and the content control is bound to an element in a custom XML part. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了和事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 此示例假定文档包含绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素的命名。 `plainTextContentControl1`This example assumes that the document contains a named `plainTextContentControl1` that is bound to an element in a custom XML part. 有关演示如何将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件中的元素的代码示例, 请参阅[演练:将内容控件绑定到自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts)XML 部件。For a code example that demonstrates how to bind a content control to an element in a custom XML part, see [Walkthrough: Binding Content Controls to Custom XML Parts](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts). 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 对于C#, 还必须将事件处理程序附加到的和事件`plainTextContentControl1`。For C#, you must also attach the event handlers to the and events of `plainTextContentControl1`. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/CS/ThisDocument.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/VB/ThisDocument.vb#7)]

summary.span: 在成功验证内容控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the content control has been successfully validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理成功验证内容控件后要运行代码的事件。Handle the event to run code after the content control has been successfully validated. 若要验证内容控件, 请处理事件。To validate the content control, handle the event. 验证内容控件时, 请确保控件中的文本满足某些条件。When you validate a content control, you make sure that the text in the control meets certain conditions. 例如, 如果你有一个包含电话号码的内容控件, 则可以验证它是否仅包含相应的字符 (数字、括号、连字符)。For example, if you have a content control that contains a phone number, you can verify that it contains only the appropriate characters (numbers, parentheses, hyphens). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了和事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 验证内容控件的值之后, 事件的事件处理程序会向最终用户显示一个消息框。After the value of the content control is validated, the event handler for the event displays a message box to the end user. 此示例假定文档包含一个名为 `plainTextContentControl1`的。This example assumes that the document contains a named `plainTextContentControl1`. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 对于C#, 还必须将事件处理程序附加到的和事件`plainTextContentControl1`。For C#, you must also attach the event handlers to the and events of `plainTextContentControl1`. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#6](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/CS/ThisDocument.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#6](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/VB/ThisDocument.vb#6)]

summary.span: 在验证内容控件的内容时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the contents of the content control are being validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件失去焦点时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when the control loses focus. 根据所选的条件, 处理事件以确定内容控件中的文本是否有效。Handle the event to determine whether the text in the content control is valid, according to criteria that you choose. 例如, 如果你有一个包含电话号码的内容控件, 则可以验证它是否仅包含相应的字符 (数字、括号、连字符)。For example, if you have a content control that contains a phone number, you can verify that it contains only the appropriate characters (numbers, parentheses, hyphens). 如果内容无效, 则可以通过将事件处理程序的 参数的属性设置为来`true`取消事件并将焦点返回到控件。If the contents are not valid, you can cancel the event and return the focus to the control by setting the property of the parameter of the event handler to `true`. 实际效果是, 在文本有效之前, 用户无法离开控件。The practical effect is that the user cannot leave the control until the text is valid. 若要在成功验证内容控件后运行代码, 请处理事件。To run code after the content control has been successfully validated, handle the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了和事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 最终用户更改内容控件中的文本后, 事件的事件处理程序将使用正则表达式来验证该文本是否不包含整数。After the end user changes the text in the content control, the event handler for the event uses a regular expression to verify that the text does not contain integers. 此示例假定文档包含一个名为 `plainTextContentControl1`的。This example assumes that the document contains a named `plainTextContentControl1`. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 对于C#, 还必须将事件处理程序附加到的和事件`plainTextContentControl1`。For C#, you must also attach the event handlers to the and events of `plainTextContentControl1`. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#6](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/CS/ThisDocument.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough#6](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlXmlPartWalkthrough/VB/ThisDocument.vb#6)]
